channel.title: FilmLA on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in FilmLA on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: L.A. County Board of Supervisors Unanimously Votes to Streamline Local Filming Processes
item.description: The motion, introduced by supervisors Kathryn Barger and Lindsey Horvath, aims to both cut down on red tape and explore an $80-$100 million fund for film technology startups.
